fields.Title of Presentation: Cardiac Abnormalities: What hat will your heart wear?
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Idaho Health Information Management Association (IdHIMA) 2013 Annual convention
fields.Description/Abstract: This presentation included an overview of the Cardiac System and the common Cardiac abnormalities that are treated medically or surgically.Infectious conditions, valvular insufficiencies, aneurysms, and congenital heart disease were described and discussed.  Care of the cardiac patient and other resources for health promotion were discussed as well. There was an emphasis on terminology for the Health Informatics Coders in attendance.
